name: Lacuna, A Game About Depression
description:
Lacuna is a retro-inspired game that tells the story of four college students and how they’re planning to put on a performance for their school festival. However, each student is struggling with depression in their own way. The player character, a fellow student, either helps the characters or will miss the signs. One choice can be the deciding factor between life and death.

This is for our Fall Semester class, please enjoy it and if you'd like leave us feedback here: https://forms.gle/v2ud8obfDq3YPubq6

This is a demo build, the full game will be released by Nov 24th 2020 (when it's due haha)
